pkgmetadata.longdescription: Gabriel Multiple Comparison Test and Plot the Confidence Interval on Barplot // Analyze multi-level one-way experimental designs where there are unequal sample sizes and population variance homogeneity can not be assumed. To conduct the Gabriel test doi:10.2307/2286265, create two vectors: one for your observations and one for the factor level of each observation. The function, rgabriel, conduct the test and save the output as a vector to input into the gabriel.plot function, which produces a confidence interval plot for Multiple Comparison.
